HomePageContent.title: HomePageContent
HomePageContent.description: Stores the content for the home page, editable by authenticated users.

id.description: Unique identifier for the HomePageContent entity.

title.description: The title of the home page.

content.description: The main content of the home page (HTML or Markdown).

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp of the last content update.

updatedBy.description: User ID of the user who last updated the content.

definition.description: Stores home page content, editable by any authenticated user.

params.name: homePageContentId
params.description: The unique identifier for the home page content.

firestore.reasoning: This Firestore data structure is designed for simple content management. The home page content can be read by anyone and updated by any authenticated user. This model prioritizes ease of use for a scenario where any logged-in user is trusted to edit content.
